actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a special postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright.

titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright.
